casebody.data:
Alvin D. HOWARD, as a known heir of the Estate of Alphonso Howard, deceased, Appellant,
v.
BANK OF AMERICA, N.A.; Unknown Heirs, Devisees, Grantees, Assignees, Lienors, Creditors, Trustees of Alphonso Howard, deceased; Anthony Howard, a/k/a Anthony C. Howard, as a known heir of the Estate of Alphonso Howard, deceased; Kanesha Howard, as a known heir of the Estate of Alphonso Howard, deceased; Trevion Howard, a minor, as a known heir of the Estate of Alphonso Howard, deceased; Bettie Newmon; Unknown Tenants/ Owners # 2, n/k/a Kamoria Shareef, and Unknown Tenants/ Owners n/k/a Ahmed Shareef, Appellees. Case No. 2D17-321 District Court of Appeal of Florida, Second District. Opinion filed September 29, 2017

DECISION WITHOUT PUBLISHED OPINION

Affirmed.
